title: Changing InDesign Minion default font
content: Whenever I start a new InDesign file it always opens with Minion as the default font. I can't stand it! (I don't mean I can't stand Minion, although it's true it doesn't work for my purposes.) I mean I can't stand that I cannot choose my own default font preference (which happens to be Centaur) for whenever I open a new InDesign file. Or can I? And I just cannot find out how to? Thanks for any pointers.
author: Anthony Barnett

comments.content: With NO DOCUMENT OPEN choose your font of choice (it will become the default font for all new docs)
Good gracious. That simple. Thank you so much, Les !
